long_description: With durable reinforcements on the backs of the hands, the Hestra Czone Mountain gloves offer wind-, waterproof and insulated protection for fast downhill skiing and racing. Waterproof, windproof twill fabric surrounds Czone waterproof, breathable membrane inserts to create a glove that offers total protection and comfortable dexterity. Polyester fiberfill insulation in the Hestra Czone Mountain gloves supplies sleek warmth and comfort even when damp; polyester linings wick moisture away from hands. Goat leather palms and finger reinforcements are highly water resistant and durable in tough conditions. Elastic/rip-and-stick adjustable wrist closures; drawcord cuff gauntlets. Small carabiner at wrists attaches gloves to each other and can hook on your jacket or ski pants so you don't lose your gloves.
